item.title: Dealing with data
item.description: Dealing with data # //todo explain HTS, FieldNode, DataObject?? Deep Linking # Deep-link builds static HATEOAS information based on query params and service-type. deep-link generally works with furo-lcation and furo-page together. 1 2 3 4 5 <furo-location ..></..> <furo-page ..></..> <furo-deep-link ƒ-qp-in="--pageQueryChanged(*.query)" service="TaskService" @-hts-out="--hts"></furo-deep-link> assume we visit a link xxx.xx/display_task?tsk=5 element deep-link receives the query param {tsk: “5”} from the wire –pageQueryChanged(*.query), which is sent by furo-page.

item.title: Routing
item.description: Routing ?? # Route # FURO supports different kinds of routing. We distinguish between deeplink (permalink), sub routing and flow events. Building blocks # You need the following building blocks: component description @furo/route/src/furo-location observes location and path @furo/data/src/furo-deep-link builds static HATEOAS information based on query params @furo/route/src/furo-pages can activate views based on the current location Deep link (perma link) # Why perma links?
